name: NuMind
headline: Create custom NLP models
description: NuMind is a tool for data scientists, data analysts, but also software engineers to create custom NLP models. For example, a recruiting company uses NuMind to find which job offers best match a given resume. Etienne (CEO) was head of Machine Learning at Wolfram Research, and Samuel (CTO) co-founded Make.org (8M users). NuMind originated from our own frustration when developing NLP models. Leveraging large language models similar to GPT-3, NuMind allows to complete NLP projects at least 10x faster than before. We launched a private beta August 2 and had 9 paying customers one month later.

founders.name: Etienne Bernard, Founder
founders.description: Etienne is an expert in AI & machine learning. After a PhD (ENS) & postdoc (MIT) in statistical physics, Etienne joined Wolfram Research where he became the head of machine learning for 7 years. During this time, Etienne led the development of automatic learning tools, a user-friendly deep learning framework, and various machine learning applications. Etienne founded NuMind in 2022.

founders.name: Samuel Bernard, Founder
founders.description:
After a PhD in Distributed Systems, Samuel was an early employee of Criteo, the Technology Innovation leader at S4M, co-founder & CTO at Make.org, and an independent coach/advisor of start-ups & data teams.  Over the years he refined his skills and became an expert in DevOps/DataOps and at managing tech teams.
He is now founder & CTO at Numind.ai.

## Quality of Organizational Data is The Biggest Challenge For 85% of Leaders
### Address the challenge with our flagship LLM NuExtract and our other foundation models specialized in information extraction tasks: trained to reduce hallucinations, highly performing and customizable.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/638364a4e52e440048a9529c/67ac8f8eadc0bbd4b1ebfade_NuMind%20Foundation%20Models.svg)
[Get Enterprise](https://www.numind.ai/<https:/calendly.com/etiennebcp/numind-demo-45?utm_source=pricing&month=2024-08>)[Check Models](https://www.numind.ai/</models>)
## Extract Structured Information With API
### Your data is not confidential, you know which information you want to extract and you have a bit of technical expertise? Access the power of NuExtract with our API platform! 
Instruct NuExtract, our flagship LLM, to intelligently extract structured information from any document. Create your API key and extract at scale!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com//numind.design.webflow.com/62655a6b-24bf-4277-9857-7bc78ae80cb2)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/638364a4e52e440048a9529c/66a20f1cd2345c255ee76dab_Structured%20Extraction.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/638364a4e52e440048a9529c/67041b9b6b4c6a5653875af9_Chemical-reactants.webp)
[Read the Blog Post](https://www.numind.ai/<https:/numind.ai/blog/nuextract-a-foundation-model-for-structured-extraction>)[Check API](https://www.numind.ai/</api>)
## Extract High-Quality Data On-Prem
### We understand privacy is a legitimate concern. Deploy your customized AI model on premise with the Enterprise platform and keep your data private at all times.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/638364a4e52e440048a9529c/67acafe553a63d6036b232c3_deploy%20model%20on%20premise.svg)
[Get Enterprise](https://www.numind.ai/<https:/calendly.com/etiennebcp/numind-demo-45?utm_source=pricing&month=2024-08>)
## Build Your Autonomous Agent With NuMind
### Tailor our foundation models to have them learn your operational workflow and autonomously perform actions and send formatted content.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/638364a4e52e440048a9529c/67ac89fa9b020a8e12acb553_Autonomous_agent.jpeg)
[Talk to Us](https://www.numind.ai/<https:/calendly.com/etiennebcp/numind-demo-45?utm_source=pricing&month=2024-08>)
## Use Cases
### NuMind covers a broad range of applications, from structured extraction or markdown generation, to domain-specific tasks including medical coding and other tailored applications.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/638364a4e52e440048a9529c/66ffe8169d4dd739d8c8762b_Healthcare_use-case.webp)

generated_description:
### NuMind: Simplifying Custom NLP Model Creation

**Overview:**
NuMind is a fresh player in the artificial intelligence space, launched in 2022 and currently part of Y Combinator's Batch S22. Based in Cambridge, MA, this nimble startup is tackling the common frustrations encountered during the development of Natural Language Processing (NLP) models. With a small team of six, including seasoned leaders Etienne, the CEO who formerly led machine learning at Wolfram Research, and CTO Samuel, a co-founder of Make.org with millions of users, NuMind is primed to leave its mark.

**Mission:**
The core mission of NuMind is straightforward: empower users to create custom NLP models swiftly and efficiently. They aim to significantly reduce the time and effort required to complete NLP projects, offering tools that make this possible‚Äîoften achieving results at least ten times faster than traditional methods.

**Product Offering:**
NuMind specializes in creating custom models particularly suited for tasks like job matching in recruitment. For instance, a recruiting firm can utilize NuMind's technology to match job postings with candidate resumes effectively. Their proprietary model, NuExtract, focuses on extracting high-quality information from various document formats (PDFs, images, tables, and text), ensuring that users can build robust databases with clean, reliable data.

**Key Features and Use Cases:**
NuMind's platform is packed with features that cater to a wide array of applications‚Äîfrom structured data extraction to domain-specific tasks such as medical coding. Their API allows users with some technical expertise to harness the power of their models and extract information at scale. Additionally, NuMind provides an enterprise solution that caters to organizations needing enhanced privacy and on-prem deployment.

**Traction:**
Since launching their private beta on August 2, 2022, NuMind has already secured nine paying customers within the first month‚Äîa promising indication of demand and readiness in the market.

**Why It Matters:**
In a world increasingly driven by data, the need for customizable, fast, and efficient NLP solutions is ever-present. NuMind not only acknowledges this necessity but seeks to streamline the process, making powerful tools accessible to data scientists, analysts, and software engineers alike. Their focus on user-friendly models signifies a shift towards democratizing machine learning applications.

**Conclusion:**
If you're curious about their offerings or want to dive into custom NLP model-making, NuMind stands at the ready. They‚Äôre not just building a product; they‚Äôre reshaping how businesses interact with data through intelligent automation and tailored solutions. You can visit them at [NuMind.ai](https://www.numind.ai).
